EmailTemplate.name: LE-2022-06-21202206-HP-ENT-SEVT-2022-AHIP-CONFERENCE.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: The value of virtual care continues to grow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Meet us at AHIP 2022
June 21–23, 2022 Las Vegas, NV
Image Woman having online consult with doctor on phone
Health plans everywhere are learning the full value of virtual care. If you’re attending AHIP 2022, we invite you to schedule a meeting <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/meet-with-us-at-ahip-2022?month=2022-06&date=2022-06-23]]> or stop by booth 806 <[[https://ahip2022.mapyourshow.com/8_0/exhview/index.cfm?orsearchtype0=exhibitor&orsearchvalue0=2091283&orsearchdisplay0=Exhibitor&orsearchvaluedisplay0=Teladoc%20Health]]> to hear more about how our virtual care solutions reach beyond a telehealth visit to revitalize the healthcare experience for all, including:
Building stronger relationships with primary care providers Improving health outcomes for mental health and chronic conditions Integrating virtual care with bricks-and-mortar for a hybrid approach Increasing access across populations to promote health equity
Join our speaking session: Now Where Does Virtual Care Fit? Value on the Continuum of Whole-Person Health Wednesday, June 22 | 11:00–11:45 a.m. PT Room Bandol 2
Attend our session to hear what our health plan partners think about the value of virtual care along the continuum of whole-person health, including member expectations, closing gaps in care, linking virtual to value and market factors influencing various virtual care strategies.
Tequila Tasting Wednesday, June 22 | 5:30–7:00 p.m. PT Booth #806
Tequila aficionado? Tequila curious? Join us during the reception in the exhibit hall for a tequila tasting event! We’ll have an expert on hand to share their knowledge of this spirit, as well as Teladoc Health reps ready to answer your questions about virtual care.
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
